scripts.dev.sql: docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.development.yml exec backend yarn sql
scripts.dev.seed: docker-compose -f docker-compose.base.yml -f docker-compose.development.yml exec backend yarn sql db:seed:all
scripts.dev.auth.init: yarn dev exec keycloak /opt/jboss/keycloak/bin/add-user-keycloak.sh -u keycloak -p password
